name: Naturparkhaus Ginzling
description:
The Zillertal Alps Nature Park House is an administrative building, library and exhibition centre all at the same time.
The nature park exhibition encourages visitors to understand and experience. At a range of multimedia and interactive stages, the visitor learns more about the fascinating mountain world of the Zillertal and the elements of nature.
Opening times: summer from June - September from Monday to Sunday from 08.30 am - 12.00 am and from 01.00 pm - 05.00 pm
Guided tours available for bigger groups with registration. Guided tours available in German and English.
Prices:
adults €4,-
children €2,-
family ticket €9,- (2 adults and up to 3 children)
free to guests from partner companies od the nature park
€1,- concession with the Zillertal Activcard
Best time to visit  is all year around.
The exhibition is especially suitable for families and schools.
